qas.question: What color jersey does Bayern Munich wear?
What is the nickname given to A.C. Milan?
What has to occur for a player in association football to be shown a red penalty card?
What occurs when a player in association football is shown a red penalty card?

answers.text: the player is immediately disqualified from further play

qas.question: How is an association football team impacted when a player is shown a red penalty card?

answers.text: his team must continue with one less player for the game's duration

plausible_answers.text: Manchester United, Bayern Munich, Liverpool, Arsenal, Toronto FC, and S.L. Benfica

qas.question: What association football teams wear all red jerseys?

plausible_answers.text: AFC Ajax, Olympiacos, River Plate, Atlético Madrid, and Flamengo

qas.question: What other sports teams wear all red jerseys?
What color card is given for an infraction?

context: Trong hiệp hội bóng đá, các đội như <b5_0> Manchester United, Bayern Munich, Liverpool, Arsenal, Toronto FC và SL Benfica <b5_0/> chủ yếu mặc <a0_0> đỏ <a0_0/> áo. Các đội khác nổi bật với màu đỏ trên bộ dụng cụ của họ bao gồm AC Milan (biệt hiệu) <a1_0> tôi rossoneri <a1_0/> cho áo sơ mi màu đỏ và đen của họ), <b6_0> AFC Ajax, Olympiacos, River Plate, Atlético Madrid và Flamengo <b6_0/> .
